Monster soldiers!?\""},{"lineNumber":246353,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーっと、動くなよ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, don’t move,"},{"lineNumber":246354,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうすりゃ痛い目見ずに済む」","translatedEnglishLine":" then you won’t get hurt.\""},{"lineNumber":246355,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ、馬鹿だな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah, how foolish…"},{"lineNumber":246356,"originalJapaneseLine":"　他の連中と同じように寝ていた方が","translatedEnglishLine":" You’d have died more easily if you’d just been sleeping like the others.\""},{"lineNumber":246357,"originalJapaneseLine":"　楽に死ねたってのに」","translatedEnglishLine":" (Continuation from above; translated together.)"},{"lineNumber":246358,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、なんだなんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, what’s this?\""},{"lineNumber":246359,"originalJapaneseLine":"「眠り損なった奴がいたのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Did someone fail to fall asleep?"},{"lineNumber":246360,"originalJapaneseLine":"　可哀想になぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":" How pitiful.\""},{"lineNumber":246361,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あ……お、お前ら、どこから……！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-Where did you guys... come from!?\""},{"lineNumber":246362,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぞろぞろと、次から次へと魔物兵が姿を見せる。","translatedEnglishLine":"One after another, monster soldiers appeared in a swarm."},{"lineNumber":246363,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はははっ！　どこからって、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha! Where else but from the entrance!"},{"lineNumber":246364,"originalJapaneseLine":"　入り口からに決まってるだろう！","translatedEnglishLine":" It’s obvious, isn’t it?"},{"lineNumber":246365,"originalJapaneseLine":"　皆、眠っているから簡単に入れたぜ！」","translatedEnglishLine":" Everyone was asleep, so it was easy to get in!\""},{"lineNumber":246366,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、起きている悪い子は……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, the naughty ones who are awake..."},{"lineNumber":246367,"originalJapaneseLine":"　永久に眠りましょうねぇ〜」","translatedEnglishLine":" will sleep forever~\""},{"lineNumber":246368,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわっ、うわぁあぁあああ〜〜〜〜！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uwaaah, waaaaahhhh!\""},{"lineNumber":246369,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物隊長が剣を振り下ろした。","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster captain swung his sword down."},{"lineNumber":246370,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":246371,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":246372,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城――","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle—"},{"lineNumber":246373,"originalJapaneseLine":"総統司令部――","translatedEnglishLine":"Supreme Commander Headquarters—"},{"lineNumber":246374,"originalJapaneseLine":"「報告です」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A report.\""},{"lineNumber":246375,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ゼスにおいて、正体不明の力により、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In Zeth, due to an unknown force,"},{"lineNumber":246376,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔軍にやすやすと占領される報告が","translatedEnglishLine":" there are repeated reports of the demon army easily occupying places."},{"lineNumber":246377,"originalJapaneseLine":"　相次いでおります」","translatedEnglishLine":"\""},{"lineNumber":246378,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁ〜？　なんだ、そりゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? What’s that supposed to mean?\""},{"lineNumber":246379,"originalJapaneseLine":"「残念ながら、原因は未だ不明。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Unfortunately, the cause is still unknown."},{"lineNumber":246380,"originalJapaneseLine":"　目下、調査中です」","translatedEnglishLine":" We are currently investigating.\""},{"lineNumber":246381,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ゼス内にある各地の砦や野営地が、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Forts and camps throughout Zeth"},{"lineNumber":246382,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほぼ戦闘が行われることなく","translatedEnglishLine":" have been occupied almost without any battle"},{"lineNumber":246383,"originalJapaneseLine":"　占領されている、とだけ」","translatedEnglishLine":" is all we know.\""},{"lineNumber":246384,"originalJapaneseLine":"「兵士は何してた？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What were the soldiers doing?\""},{"lineNumber":246385,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうやら……眠っていたようです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Apparently... they were asleep.\""},{"lineNumber":246386,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんだとー！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-What!? Those idiots deserve the death penalty!\""},{"lineNumber":246387,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんなすっとこどっこい共は死刑だ死刑！」","translatedEnglishLine":" (Continuation from above; translated together.)"},{"lineNumber":246388,"originalJapaneseLine":"「総統、落ち着いて下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Supreme Commander, please calm down."},{"lineNumber":246389,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうやら何かの力による、","translatedEnglishLine":" It seems they were put into a group sleep by some kind of power."},{"lineNumber":246390,"originalJapaneseLine":"　集団睡眠にあったものと思われます」","translatedEnglishLine":"\""},{"lineNumber":246391,"originalJapaneseLine":"「集団睡眠、ということは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Group sleep, you say... so"},{"lineNumber":246392,"originalJapaneseLine":"　スリープの魔法か何か、でしょうか？」","translatedEnglishLine":" it might be a sleep magic or something?\""},{"lineNumber":246393,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい、私達参謀はその線を疑っています」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yes, our staff suspects that possibility.\""},{"lineNumber":246394,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何か……魔人の特殊な魔法か力か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Some kind of... special magic or power from a demon...\""},{"lineNumber":246395,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とにかく、兵には注意するようにと伝えてますが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anyway, we've told the soldiers to be careful,"},{"lineNumber":246396,"originalJapaneseLine":"　原因が分からなければ、","translatedEnglishLine":" but without knowing the cause,"},{"lineNumber":246397,"originalJapaneseLine":"　対策の取りようもなくて……」","translatedEnglishLine":" there’s no way to take countermeasures...\""},{"lineNumber":246398,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふ〜む……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":246399,"originalJapaneseLine":"「集団睡眠……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Group sleep...\""},{"lineNumber":246400,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まさか、な……」","translatedEnglishLine":" Surely not...\""},{"lineNumber":246401,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":246402,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":246403,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス平原――","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeth Plains—"},{"lineNumber":246404,"originalJapaneseLine":"自由都市――","translatedEnglishLine":"Free City—"},{"lineNumber":246405,"originalJapaneseLine":"前線にある砦の、見張り台に上った兵が","translatedEnglishLine":"A soldier climbed the watchtower of a frontline fort"},{"lineNumber":246406,"originalJapaneseLine":"月に向かって大口を開けた。","translatedEnglishLine":" and yawned widely towards the moon."},{"lineNumber":246407,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふわああああ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fuwaaaaah...\" (a big yawn)"},{"lineNumber":246408,"originalJapaneseLine":"　くっ、眠い……」","translatedEnglishLine":" \"Ugh, so sleepy...\""},{"lineNumber":246409,"originalJapaneseLine":"滲んだ涙をぬぐうため目を擦りながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rubbing his eyes to wipe away the teary blur,"},{"lineNumber":246410,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふと隣を見れば同じく見張りの兵が","translatedEnglishLine":" he glanced sideways and saw another sentry"},{"lineNumber":246411,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウトウトと船をこいでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":" also nodding off, dozing off drowsily."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ、魔物兵だと！？」
「おーっと、動くなよ、
そうすりゃ痛い目見ずに済む」
「ふっ、馬鹿だな……
他の連中と同じように寝ていた方が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’d have died more easily if you’d just been sleeping like the others."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 楽に死ねたってのに」
「お、なんだなんだ？」
「眠り損なった奴がいたのか？
可哀想になぁ」
「あ、あ……お、お前ら、どこから……！？」
ぞろぞろと、次から次へと魔物兵が姿を見せる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One after another, monster soldiers appeared in a swarm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はははっ！　どこからって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha! Where else but from the entrance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 入り口からに決まってるだろう！
皆、眠っているから簡単に入れたぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone was asleep, so it was easy to get in!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、起きている悪い子は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, the naughty ones who are awake...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 永久に眠りましょうねぇ〜」
「うわっ、うわぁあぁあああ〜〜〜〜！」
魔物隊長が剣を振り下ろした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain swung his sword down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城――
総統司令部――
「報告です」
「ゼスにおいて、正体不明の力により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In Zeth, due to an unknown force,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍にやすやすと占領される報告が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are repeated reports of the demon army easily occupying places.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相次いでおります」
「はぁ〜？　なんだ、そりゃ」
「残念ながら、原因は未だ不明。
目下、調査中です」
「ゼス内にある各地の砦や野営地が、
ほぼ戦闘が行われることなく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have been occupied almost without any battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 占領されている、とだけ」
「兵士は何してた？」
「どうやら……眠っていたようです」
「な、なんだとー！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-What!? Those idiots deserve the death penalty!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなすっとこどっこい共は死刑だ死刑！」
「総統、落ち着いて下さい。
どうやら何かの力による、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems they were put into a group sleep by some kind of power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 集団睡眠にあったものと思われます」
「集団睡眠、ということは……
スリープの魔法か何か、でしょうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it might be a sleep magic or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい、私達参謀はその線を疑っています」
「何か……魔人の特殊な魔法か力か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Some kind of... special magic or power from a demon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とにかく、兵には注意するようにと伝えてますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyway, we've told the soldiers to be careful,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 原因が分からなければ、
対策の取りようもなくて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there’s no way to take countermeasures..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「集団睡眠……
まさか、な……」
ゼス平原――
自由都市――
前線にある砦の、見張り台に上った兵が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A soldier climbed the watchtower of a frontline fort

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 月に向かって大口を開けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and yawned widely towards the moon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふわああああ……
くっ、眠い……」
滲んだ涙をぬぐうため目を擦りながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rubbing his eyes to wipe away the teary blur,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふと隣を見れば同じく見張りの兵が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he glanced sideways and saw another sentry

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウトウトと船をこいでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: also nodding off, dozing off drowsily.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ、魔物兵だと！？」
「おーっと、動くなよ、
そうすりゃ痛い目見ずに済む」
「ふっ、馬鹿だな……
他の連中と同じように寝ていた方が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’d have died more easily if you’d just been sleeping like the others."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 楽に死ねたってのに」
「お、なんだなんだ？」
「眠り損なった奴がいたのか？
可哀想になぁ」
「あ、あ……お、お前ら、どこから……！？」
ぞろぞろと、次から次へと魔物兵が姿を見せる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One after another, monster soldiers appeared in a swarm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はははっ！　どこからって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha! Where else but from the entrance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 入り口からに決まってるだろう！
皆、眠っているから簡単に入れたぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone was asleep, so it was easy to get in!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、起きている悪い子は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, the naughty ones who are awake...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 永久に眠りましょうねぇ〜」
「うわっ、うわぁあぁあああ〜〜〜〜！」
魔物隊長が剣を振り下ろした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain swung his sword down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城――
総統司令部――
「報告です」
「ゼスにおいて、正体不明の力により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In Zeth, due to an unknown force,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍にやすやすと占領される報告が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are repeated reports of the demon army easily occupying places.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相次いでおります」
「はぁ〜？　なんだ、そりゃ」
「残念ながら、原因は未だ不明。
目下、調査中です」
「ゼス内にある各地の砦や野営地が、
ほぼ戦闘が行われることなく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have been occupied almost without any battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 占領されている、とだけ」
「兵士は何してた？」
「どうやら……眠っていたようです」
「な、なんだとー！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-What!? Those idiots deserve the death penalty!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなすっとこどっこい共は死刑だ死刑！」
「総統、落ち着いて下さい。
どうやら何かの力による、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems they were put into a group sleep by some kind of power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 集団睡眠にあったものと思われます」
「集団睡眠、ということは……
スリープの魔法か何か、でしょうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it might be a sleep magic or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい、私達参謀はその線を疑っています」
「何か……魔人の特殊な魔法か力か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Some kind of... special magic or power from a demon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とにかく、兵には注意するようにと伝えてますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyway, we've told the soldiers to be careful,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 原因が分からなければ、
対策の取りようもなくて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there’s no way to take countermeasures..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「集団睡眠……
まさか、な……」
ゼス平原――
自由都市――
前線にある砦の、見張り台に上った兵が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A soldier climbed the watchtower of a frontline fort

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 月に向かって大口を開けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and yawned widely towards the moon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふわああああ……
くっ、眠い……」
滲んだ涙をぬぐうため目を擦りながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rubbing his eyes to wipe away the teary blur,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふと隣を見れば同じく見張りの兵が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he glanced sideways and saw another sentry

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウトウトと船をこいでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: also nodding off, dozing off drowsily.
